definition: hurriedly/without delay
to overtake/to catch up with/to hurry/to rush/to try to catch (the bus etc)/to drive (cattle etc) forward/to drive (sb) away/to avail oneself of (an opportunity)/until
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten

sentences.english: Let me just finish this digression.
sentences.chinese: 让我赶紧结束这次跑题。

sentences.english: I quickly wrote my name clearly.
sentences.chinese: 我赶紧一笔一画地写好了自己的名字。

sentences.english: She stared towards them and they ran to his car and sped off.
sentences.chinese: 她紧盯着他们，他们俩吓得赶紧跑进车开走了。

sentences.english: Live, pluck the roses of the world to-day.
sentences.chinese: 生活吧，趁今朝赶紧采下那世俗的玫瑰。

sentences.english: I have to scat now, I will be late.
sentences.chinese: 我得赶紧走了，我快迟到了。

sentences.english: Make your bed. Do it now.
Hurry up. Get up and start to work.
He told me to put on my cloak and run to Gimmerton for the doctor and the parson.
sentences.chinese: 他叫我穿上外衣，赶紧跑到吉默吞去请医生和牧师。

sentences.english: Lin Pingzhi picked up cassock secretly run away quickly.
sentences.chinese: 林平之捡了袈裟赶紧偷偷跑掉。

sentences.english: I am frightened, and hurriedly fled the bedroom of my sister Barbara's .
sentences.chinese: 我吓坏了，赶紧逃向了我妹妹芭芭拉的卧室中。

sentences.english: I had to flee to the airport.
sentences.chinese: 我得赶紧撤到机场去了。

sentences.english: They are working hard against the clock to translate the novel.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在分秒必争地赶紧翻译那本小说。
警察来了，我们赶紧离开吧。

sentences.english: To the left side, then come to the right side.
sentences.chinese: 到左边去了，那就赶紧往右拐。

sentences.english: Mom suggested that I should get a refund on the air-conditioner right away.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈建议我赶紧把这台冷气拿去退钱。

sentences.english: He quickly opens the door and fumbles an arm and pulls it hard.
sentences.chinese: 他赶紧打开车门，摸到一只手臂，使劲拽。

definition: at once/immediately
at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
to do sth more quickly/Hurry up!/Get a move on!
at once/immediately/promptly/swiftly
forthwith/immediate/prompt/promptly/straightway/thereupon/at once
(onom.) smack!
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
promptly/at once
rapid/quick/speed/rate/soon/almost/to make haste/clever/sharp (of knives or wits)/forthright/plainspoken/gratified/pleased/pleasant
erhua variant of 快點|快点[kuai4 dian3]
to chant/see 梵唄|梵呗[fan4 bai4]
modal particle indicating indicating lack of enthusiasm/modal particle indicating that things should only or can only be done a certain way
Don't worry!
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
immediately
to worry/to feel anxious/Taiwan pr. [zhao1 ji2]
this time
thereupon/as a result/consequently/thus/hence
